title: Wonderland Lulu
body: Does someone know, when the Wonderland Skin from Lulu, will be sold again?

replies.body:
Heeey Schiiiggy!~

[http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-coming](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-coming)

You can buy the skin between 10. Dec -- 08. Jan but only as a bundle :/
I know, it's annoying but it's the only way how you can get the skin.

Greez,
~_Adashino_
